name: UE4Jam Summer 2018 BwaaAAAH! RAMJAM
description:
This game is part of the Summer 2018 UE4Jam.

BwaaAAAH! RAMJAM is a 2-4 players local brawler game. Your goal is simply to eject your opponents out of the arena to be the last sheep standing. BUT BEWARE, every 10 seconds, a new random game mode is added to the game, it adds up to every other you are still enduring... yes, it will be chaos after a few seconds.

The game was done in 3 days by a team of 5 devs. We hope you enjoy the game as much as we had fun discovering new bugs on it.

Team Name: White Smoke Games

Each Team Member's Name and Email Address:
- Maxime Bodin: maxime.bodin@whitesmokegames.com

Game Name: BwaaAAAH! RAMJAM
